The '''Norfield Glen''' was a forest within the [[Rhovanion Hills|hills]] of [[Rhovanion]]. The Norfield Glen was invented for ''[[The Lord of the Rings: The Rings of Power]]'' by [[Amazon Studios]].

== History ==
In the late [[Second Age]], the Norfield Glen was one of the seasonal havens where a tribe of [[Harfoots]] migrated to in mid-summer due to the edible snails that were said to live there. The Harfoots held their [[Harvest Festival]] there.
